europeana:record.dc:title: Denisia 18 (2006)
europeana:record.dc:creator: Anonym , Bartsch Ilse, Bellan-Santini Denise, Biscoito Manuel, Bright Monika, Cosel von Rudo, Desbruyeres Daniel, Guinot Danièle, Holzmann Maria, Ivanenko Viatcheslav N., Komai Tomoyuki, Kudenov Jerry D., Newman William A., Salvini-Plawen Luitfried, Segonzac Michel, Southward Alan J., Vacelet Jean, Verschelde Dominick, Vervoort Willem, Yamaguchi Toshiyuki, Zekely Julia
europeana:record.dc:description: Inhaltsverzeichnis: Monika Bright: Contents 1- 4. Daniel Desbruyeres, Michel Segonzac, Monika Bright: Abstract, Foreword, Acknowledgements 5- 12. Monika Bright: Milestones in the discovery of hydrothermal-vent faunas 13- 25. Monika Bright: Hydrothermal vent meiofauna 27- 30. Maria Holzmann: Granuloreticulosa, Foraminifera 31- 33. Jean Vacelet: Porifera 35- 48. Willem Vervoort, Michel Segonzac: Cnidaria, Hydrozoa, Leptolida, Anthoathecata, Candelabridae 49- 73. Luitfried Salvini-Plawen: Mollusca, Solenogastres 75- 140. Rudo Cosel von: Mollusca, Bivalvia 141- 172. Dominick Verschelde, Julia Zekely, Monika Bright: Nematoda 173- 185. Jerry D. Kudenov: Annelida, Polychaeta, Eunicida, Amphinomidae 186- 297. Ilse Bartsch: Arthropoda, Chelicerata, Arachnida, Acariformes, Halacaridae 299- 315. Viatcheslav N. Ivanenko: Arthropoda, Crustacea, Copepoda 316- 355. William A. Newman, Toshiyuki Yamaguchi, Alan J. Southward, Michel Segonzac: Arthropoda, Crustacea, Cirripedia 356- 381. Denise Bellan-Santini: Arthropoda, Crustacea, Amphipoda 382- 409. Tomoyuki Komai: Decapoda, Caridea 410- 454. Danièle Guinot, Michel Segonzac: Crustacea, Brachyura 455- 487. Manuel Biscoito: Chordata, Chondrichthyes & Osteichthyes 489- 511. Daniel Desbruyeres: Major known deep-sea hydrothermal vent fields 513- 517. Monika Bright: Abbreviations, ridges, back-arc basins and vent fields 518. Anonym: Species list 519- 531. Anonym: Cnidaria, Anthozoa 532- 541. Anonym: Genus index 542- 544
